PropertyList.title: SR71-BackBird

key.name: Ctrl-A
key.desc: Toggle Unlock/Lock Autopilot on the current Altitude

key.name: Ctrl-b
key.desc: Prepare braking chute deployement, open the doors

key.name: j
key.desc: Reload Braking Chute, and close the doors

PropertyList.text:
First Contact with Blackbird Now you are sitting in the Pilot cockpit On the Forward Cockpit if Blackbird SR71-A With view "7" you can see the RSO cockpit (not yet with equipemnts) On the Rear Cockpit if Blackbird SR71-B training With view "7" you can see the Pilot Student cockpit The Electric Master is OFF The Engines is "cut off" ON The canopy are "open" The Parking Brake is ON
====Start Routine========== Electric Master Switch On => key "}" Get the external Starter ressources with "s" key The engine will spin up to a maximum of about %25 N2 (%5.2 N1) This simulates the action of the external starter. After reaching %15 N2, Cutoff to False => key "{" wait for the EP Ratio needle close to 1.1 Don't forget to close the canopy key => "d" Parking brake Off then push the throttle to take off
Run on ground until 180 kts take off before 210 kts ( above you will damage the tyres)
====To get 85000 feets======= After take Off and Landing gear UP, set the trottle to maximum and Step 1 =>set the Autopilot "Pitch Hold" to 10 =>Climb until 33000 ft , you shoul be at 1.09mach Step 2 =>Then descent at 30,000 ft , you will be at 1.15 Mach Step 3 => Now you can climb at 65000 and getting 2.30 Mach ( not less) Step 4 => Then you may now climb to cruise speed and altitude 3.2 Mach 85000 ft Beware: You will never get the right thrust, if you don't get 1.15 Mach above 28000 ft Recommendation: these operations will be easier when you are using the autopilot Step 1 "Pitch Hold" to 10 and then "Altitude Hold 33000" Step 2 Altitude 30000 Step 3 Altitude 65000 Step 4 Altitude 85000
====Refueling============ ONLY On gound refueling, if Airspeed less than 20 kts With Hotspot on Panel => transferswitch LMB => ON or MMB => OFF
ONLY Air refueling if Airspeed more than 200 kts and Agl more than 300 feet With Hotspot on Panel => transfer switch LMB => ON or MMB => OFF AND With "F" Key which open the Doors need refuel contact with Tanker (indicated by the green light "ON" on left top of the radar )
====Landing============== Final approach speed kias 185, landing speed 165 kias.
====Braking Chute========== the braking chute will be automaticlly deployed When the following conditions are all true
Brake Chute doors are openeded => key "Ctrl-b" Gear on Runway Throttle position less than 0.3
the braking chute will be released, untied When Airspeed less than 60 kts REMEMBER it can be used only once If you want it again you must reload it => key "j"
====Radar================ That Radar is the last version ("Vivian" Radar ) you can choose the range by clicking on the switch =>mouse button 1 to decrease =>mouse button 0 to increase
====Tacan================ The Tacan instrument is situated or the left side of the cockpit That instrument is fully operationnal, look at the hotspot to enter the right values ====Autopilot============== The autopilot can be ON/OFF with Altitude and Heading with key => "Ctrl A" (toggle ON/OF) for the current Altitude
